meanings.definition: A small magnifying glass used by jewelers and watchmakers.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler used loupes to see the tiny details on the diamond.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her loupes with her when working on intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue under the microscope, but the loupes revealed the hidden message.
meanings.sent4: His loupes transformed the small print into clear, readable text.
meanings.sent5: With the help of loupes, the artist could paint the intricate patterns with precision.

meanings.definition: To examine or inspect closely using a loupe.
meanings.sent1: The scientist loupes the specimen to study its structure.
meanings.sent2: He loupes each gem carefully before adding it to the collection.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat loupes the new toy to understand how it works.
meanings.sent4: She loupes the document for any errors before submitting it.
meanings.sent5: Louping the map, he discovered a hidden treasure marked with an X.
